newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russian Central Bank sells 2.5 bln rbls of bills.
newsitem.headline: Russian Central Bank sells 2.5 bln rbls of bills.

text.p: The central bank sold 2.50 billion roubles nominal of GKO discount Treasury bills on behalf of the Finance Ministry on Thursday, the bank's open-market operations department said.
The bank made the following transactions:
The bank did not say at what price the paper was sold. The 21076 issue closed on Thursday at 84.86 percent, and the 22085 issue closed at 88.15 percent.

Apart from intervening on its own account for liquidity-smoothing and monetary policy purposes, the central bank buys and sells securities as part of its management of the Finance Ministry's debt and asset portfolio.
